title: 2008-05-18 Roger Waters, O2 Arena, London
description:
Date: 18th May 2008
Venue: O2 Arena, London
Band: Roger Waters

Tracklist: 
First half: you can probably figure this out for yourself
interval: hilarity in the queue for the gents
Second half: Dark Side of the Moon

Source: Marantz PMD620, internal microphones, CD quality Wav -> USB -> Adobe Audition (EQ, volume normalisation) -> CD Wav (tracksplitting) -> TLH (FLAC)

Taper: sonicsavage
Location: stage right, about 1/3 back down the arena, front row of Tier 4 (highest level)
